playbooks.description: Validates admin portal login, breadcrumb navigation, and mode switching. Tests requirements ADMIN-HIDDEN, ADMIN-AUTH, ADMIN-MODES, ADMIN-NAV, ADMIN-BREADCRUMB. Note: Session persistence across navigations fails in BAS/Browserless environment (known limitation), so workflow stays on admin home page after login.
Validates agent integration and variant management UI. Tests requirements AGENT-TRIGGER, AGENT-INPUT. Note: BAS/Browserless session persistence limitation prevents testing full customization flow.
